data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Hambantota, Sri Lanka.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hambantota, Sri Lanka
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Hambantota with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.section_summary: On average, 185 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Hambantota, Sri Lanka.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Hambantota.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Hambantota, Sri Lanka.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Pashtun, Pathan people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Pashtun, Pathan people.
Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Hambantota, Sri Lanka.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Hambantota who will make disciples who make disciples.
Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Hambantota. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

location.name: Hambantota
location.people_groups_list: Rodiya, Sonar (Hindu traditions), Parsee, Vellidura, Paraiyan (Hindu traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Rodiya (18,000), Sonar (Hindu traditions) (6,200), Parsee (700), Vellidura (1,200), Paraiyan (Hindu traditions) (102,000)
